name: Komikku v1.12.1
body:
### What's Changed

#### New

##### UI

- **Error screen** for Library update (@cuong-tran)
- **Custom color theme** (@kana-shii) with Colors palette (@cuong-tran)
- **Panorama cover** showing wide cover in full (@cuong-tran)
- **Language flags** (@cuong-tran)
- **Repo icon** for Repo (@cuong-tran)
- show all entries going to be checked for **Smart update** (@cuong-tran)
- show **duplicating manga cover** on Duplicate dialog (@cuong-tran)

##### Action

- **Hidden categories** to hide yours *things* from nosy people (@cuong-tran)
- **Random library sort** for your inspiration(@jackhamilton)
- **Chips for Saved search** in source browse (@cuong-tran)
- **Docking Read/Resume button** (@cuong-tran)
- **Merge multiple** library entries together at same time (@cuong-tran)
- **Range-selection for Migration** (@cuong-tran)
- **Hide library entries in Feed** (@cuong-tran)
- Add source search, icon & flag on **Feed adding dialog** (@cuong-tran)
- Easy **re-ordering Feed & Saved search** (@cuong-tran)
- Ability to **enable/disable repo** (@cuong-tran)
- Show **extensions from multiple repos** (@cuong-tran)
- Default disable **integrated H** features (fresh install) (@cuong-tran)
- Add option to opt out of ~~Analytics and~~ Crashlytics (@Animeboynz)

#### Improve

- Show **quantity badge** on Upcoming screen (@cuong-tran)
- Add option to **skip downloading duplicate read chapters** (@shabnix)
- Allow **sync Feeds & extension's settings** (@cuong-tran)
- Option to **not backup Saved searches & Feeds** (@cuong-tran)
- Option to **Always/Ask/Never update trackers** when chapter marked as read (@Animeboynz)
- Show a toast whenever progress is synced from Trackers (@cuong-tran)
- update all trackers progress when new tracker is added (@cuong-tran)
- Allow disable smart-update for individual & fix custom interval update (@kana-shii)
- Show download state and progress on reader chapter list (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Show local chapters as downloaded on merged entries. (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Allow adding multiple tags separated by commas (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- make global search pinned/all sticky (@cuong-tran)
- hide Pinned chip in Global/Migrate Search if no pinned sources available (@cuong-tran)
- hide Filter save-button on SourceFeedScreen (@cuong-tran)
- show loading indicator while bulk-favorite is running (@cuong-tran)
- bulk-favorite: reverse selection (@cuong-tran)
- Add extensions list refresh menu (@cuong-tran)
- Respect privacy settings in extension update notification (@Animeboynz)
- Add "show entry" action to download notifications (@mm12)
- Avoid blocking call causing lag when open Settings (@cuong-tran)
- allow chapter 0 dupe auto mark as read (@Riztard)
- Re-enable fetching chapters list for entries with licensed status (@Animeboynz)
- hide batch-add if integrated H & Delegated src is off (@Riztard)
- add MangaDex to batch-add example (@cuong-tran)
- Remove more unnecessary permissions from Firebase dependency (@AntsyLich)
- rename `Related Titles` to `Suggestions` (@cuong-tran)
- only load suggestions after entry finished loading info & chapters (@cuong-tran)
- Add confirmation when adding repo via URI (@Animeboynz)
- Confirmation dialog when removing privately installed extensions (@Animeboynz)
- Hide sync library option when sync is disabled (@FuSan21)
- Hide keyboard when a Tracker SearchResultItem is clicked (@Animeboynz)
- Back button on smart-search source (@cuong-tran)
- Remove legacy broken source and history backup (@AntsyLich)
- Move "Choose what to sync" out of "Sync now" (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Enable 'Split Tall Images' by default (@Smol-Ame)
- Ignore "intent://" urls on webview (@bapeey)
- Hide display mode for e-hentai (@cuong-tran)
- Reduce ChapterNavigator horizontal padding on small ui (@AntsyLich)
- Respect the `altTitlesInDesc` preference (MangaDex) (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Respect `thumbnailQuality` and `tryUsingFirstVolumeCover` preferences (@NGB-Was-Taken)

#### Fix

- Remove built-in Komikku repo (fresh install) (@cuong-tran)
- Fix for ExHentai (@jobobby04)
- Fix dropdown menu position (@cuong-tran)
- Fix late loading saved-searches/filters when jump from other screens (@cuong-tran)
- Don't show Suggestions for merged entries (@cuong-tran)
- Don't expand description on the manga found by smart search being used for merging (@cuong-tran)
- Fix sync progress from tracker not working if chapters' order is messed up after backup restoration (@cuong-tran)
- Fix app crash when removing tracked entry from tracker (@cuong-tran)
- Safe-guard some edge-cases where chapters are duplicated causing a crash on a merged entry (@cuong-tran)
- Retain remote last chapter read if it's higher than the local one for EnhancedTracker (@brewkunz)
- Fix crashlytics (@cuong-tran)
- Fix Kitsu `ratingTwenty` being typed as String (@MajorTanya)
- Fix Kitsu `synopsis` nullability (@MajorTanya)
- Fix AniList `ALSearchItem.status` nullibility (@Secozzi)
- Fix EnhancedTracker not auto binding when adding manga to library (@brewkunz)
- Fix issue with not showing source names in merged manga sometimes (@jobobby04)
- Fix source search box's height (@cuong-tran)
- Fix settings SliderItem steps count (@abdurisaq)

##### Hotfix for v1.12.0

- Fix release update version checking
- Migration integrated H enable
- add Back button on Migration screen
- fix crash if cancel migration too soon
- fix unable to migrate after manually cancel & search for entry

#### Based on

- Mihon stable 0.17.0 (Oct 26, 2024)
- TachiyomiSY stable 1.11.0 (Oct 28, 2024)

*Full Changelog*: https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/v1.11.2...v1.12.1

---

### Checksums

| Variant | SHA-256 |
| ------- | ------- |
| Universal | 979d69cc357729161d5846aab6500aff8d78f89a32176f7a55228eaa693c1a0e |
| arm64-v8a | f802acdf36b0ff7a3cb0a158bd1fbac6a229669fe545fd5bab8142cd92ecda0b |
| armeabi-v7a | fb0a72e7dbfed270f8a0d3495307f44e0d53110f3e7f6abad911a0bae2f7939d |
| x86 | c2629e414f319af8de9ef6c7cf700463c28fbcea7a006a1558c8e0ada3cb064a |
| x86_64 | 2f95110d1f89efdfe6551f01e8a1b064d697458953084e3df78b39011622c8f1 |

### If you are unsure which apk to download then go with `Komikku-v1.12.1.apk`

name: Komikku v1.11.2
body:
## What's Changed
### New
- Support for backing up and restoring Feeds (@cuong-tran)
- Allow changing feeds' order (@cuong-tran)
- Show progress-banner for sync/restore/update (@cuong-tran)
- Jump to entry from download queue item (@cuong-tran)
- Long-click search drop-down menu for entry's title/author/artist/source (@cuong-tran)
- Support sources search in Migrate Source Screen (@cuong-tran)
- Adds Reader Option to Copy Panel to Clipboard (@Animeboynz)
- Added configuration options to e-ink page flashes (@sirlag)

### Improve
- (performance) Rework cover's loading animation (@cuong-tran)
- Update default popular user-agent, better support Cloudflare (@cuong-tran)
- Onboarding permissions request for external storage (@cuong-tran)
- Request for storage permission when saving pictures (Android P & below) (@cuong-tran)
- Improve google drive sync. (@kaiserbh)
- Background color for favorite entries (@cuong-tran)
- Update E-Hentai to support libraryColored, bulk-selection overlay (@cuong-tran)
- Make global search "Has result" sticky (@AntsyLich)
- Format Category String on Subtitle Display (@Animeboynz)
- Press back to clear source search query (@cuong-tran)
- Smart Update Dialog Tweak (@Animeboynz)
- Update LewdMangaChecker (@gelionexists)

### Fix
- (performance) Laggy after browsing library for a while (@cuong-tran)
- Migrate/copy manga with `Delete downloaded` unticked had no effect, always delete (@cuong-tran)
- Copy icon (migration whole list) was always migrating instead of copy (@cuong-tran)
- Dialog's button wrong order (@cuong-tran)
- Fix library is backed up when disabled and make categories backup/restore independent (@AntsyLich)
- Fix issue with creating and restoring backup (@AntsyLich)
- Revert chapter's filter icon (@cuong-tran)
- Fix some issues when reading/saving images (@foolbar)
- Correct tako variable colours (@CrepeTF)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/v1.11.1...v1.11.2

---

### Checksums

| Variant | SHA-256 |
| ------- | ------- |

| armeabi-v7a | 0e3e7d29c5f7a17c795803610ecc6db22aea91d1ae00d6e6003efccd1d16714d |
| x86 | dbdd76437c4a137dc64ba1fd971ecdf3a6d82bd6abcca4ccb590d0285222d23e |
| x86_64 | 950bbf02f513c9fc79e1ee469f802aad8f6ce09b8d66c875cccf8c761193b2e4 |

### If you are unsure which apk to download then go with `Komikku-v1.11.2.apk`

name: Komikku v1.11.1
body:
## What's Changed
### Welcome to Komikku's Discord

### New
- New App icon
- More App themes
- Theme based on entry's cover color
- More *Suggestions* with a dedicated screen
- Auto 2-way sync read chapters from Trackers & swipe read to update
- Add NSFW filter & source search into Merge screen
- A peek into Preview-build's 'What's New' in About screen
- Support only Android 8+

### Improve
- Improved Faster loading of *Suggestions*
- Better background for full cover view
- Better cover-error & cover-loading
- Sticky header & language for sources filter
- Update translation
- Update dependencies

### Fix
- Allow manual edit on Tracker's chapter (must hit Done on keyboard)
- Fix Genre tag search while browsing *Suggestions* or from *Feed* Screen
- Fix Bangumi tracker
- Fix GDrive sync error messages
- Fix sometimes it's loading forever if app sleeps for too long (in Source's feed & browse screens)

#### Based on TachiyomiSY v1.10.6 & Mihon 0.16.5
- New: Trust all extensions by repo
- New: Add Namicomi support for external chapters on MD
- Improved: Massively improve findFile performance
- Fix: storage permission request for non-conforming devices

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/v1.10.5...v1.11.1

---

name: Komikku Preview Build 21
body:
- Showing *Suggestions* (enable in Settings/Browse)
- Ability to select all titles from Feed/Browse/Latest/Search to add to Favorite
- Adjust cache refresh's interval (previously fixed to 1 hour)

- Sync with TachiyomiSY:
  - Update image-decoder (#466) (@az4521)
  - Fix multiple issues regarding sources loading too late (@jobobby04)
  - Fix dual page split for local source (#485) (@FooIbar)
  - Fix shizuku being buggy for multi user setups (#494) (@Redjard)
  - Fix cross device syncing logic. (#450) (@kaiserbh)
  - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (#445) (@weblate)
  - feat: add cross device sync (#1005) (@kaiserbh)
  - Add option to reset custom manga info (#1118) (@LetrixZ)
  - Fix webtoon last visible item position calculation (#562) (@FooIbar)
  - Rework Duplicate Dialog and Allow Migration (#492) (@sirlag)
  - Update WebView to support lower minSDK (@jobobby04)
  - New Feature: Introduce Upcoming page to Mihon (#420) (@sirlag)
  - Moves upcoming requirement from existence to current day or later. (#606) (@sirlag)
  - Fix build time zone in about screen (@AntsyLich)
  - Update Simplified Chinese Translation (#1126) (@Howard20181)
  - [RU] Translations (#1129) (@Dexroneum)
  - Safer password handling (#1146) (@Shamicen)
  - feat: syncing etag and overall improvement. (#1155) (@kaiserbh)
  - fix: check order before restore from backup (#1156) (@Cologler)
  - ...

name: Komikku Preview Build 14
body:
### Commits

https://github.com/cuongtran/komikku/compare/7874363e0...3c5bc801c

- ExtensionsScreen: display extension lang even for not-installed ones (@cuong-tran)
- Add extensions setting to sources long click (@cuong-tran)
- transfer repo to komikku-app (@cuong-tran)
- refactor: db changes for syncing. (#113) (@kaiserbh)
- Fix "Flash on page change" gives black screen on page change (@AntsyLich)
- Backup and Restore Excluded scanlators (#166) (@jobobby04)
- Fix faulty MangaUpdates score in db (@AntsyLich)
- Remove usage of `.not()` where possible (@AntsyLich)
- Fix issues when updating extensions (@AntsyLich)
- Translations (#189) (@AntsyLich)
- update useragent (@cuong-tran)
- Swap over to Mihon.app (@jobobby04)
- Adding Type-safe project accessors (#194) (@theolm)
- Fix #126: Inconsistent button height with some languages in "Data and storage" (#202) (@theolm)
- Fix refreshing from enhanced tracker (#219) (@Secozzi)
- Translations update from Hosted Weblate (#225) (@weblate)
- Fix MangaDexs followStatus & type of TrackStatuss property (@cuong-tran)
- [skip ci] Translations update from Hosted Weblate (#190) (@weblate)
- Hide display cutout setting if fullscreen is off (#241) (@Soitora)
- Fixing bottom sheet UI bug in non-tablet devices (#182) (@theolm)
- Change extension update error file name (#253) (@cuong-tran)
- Adding Detekt in the project (#216) (@theolm)
- Fix #197 - Scroll crashing (#272) (@theolm)
- Upgrade `combose-bom` to latest (@AntsyLich)
- Add click-to-copy extension debug info (#271) (@MajorTanya)
- Address build warning in `:i18n` (@AntsyLich)
- Move `:core` to `:core:common` (@AntsyLich)
- Fix new extension install not registering in app. (#275) (@AwkwardPeak7)
- Lint (@AntsyLich)
- Translations update from Hosted Weblate (#269) (@weblate)
- [skip ci] Increase size of the message indicating which apk to download (@AntsyLich)
- Don't throw `MALTokenExpired` whenever we fail to refresh MAL token (@AntsyLich)
- Remove old `ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md` (@AntsyLich)
- add toggle to auto mark read dupe chapter (#1078) (@Riztard)
- Fix blank box if empty (#1069) (@Riztard)

name: Komikku Preview Build 11
body:

- Make tracker use Komikkus client (@cuong-tran)

- Lint (@AntsyLich)
- Update types of legacy tracker model to match to domain one (#245) (@cuong-tran)
- Support both Komikku & Mihon tracking (@cuong-tran)

name: Komikku Preview Build 5
body:
### Commits

https://github.com/cuongtran/komikku/compare/31e5bddb5...77e40033d

- Fix score issue with MangaUpdates (@AntsyLich)
- Update README & CONTRIBUTE to new repo & remove FUNDING (@cuong-tran)
- Update ISSUE_TEMPLATE to new repo (@cuong-tran)
- update Github workflow scripts (@cuong-tran)
- Change app name & ID, update gitignore (@cuong-tran)
- Replace new name in strings (@cuong-tran)
- replace new ID for S-Pen (@cuong-tran)
- Change update repo (@cuong-tran)
- New icon (@cuong-tran)
- Better vector icon (@cuong-tran)
- Remove files executable permission (@cuong-tran)
- Show Untrusted extensions above Trusted extensions (@cuong-tran)
- Add OFFICIAL source & mine signature (@cuong-tran)
- using FastScrollLazyColumn for SourcesScreen scrollbar (@cuong-tran)
- SourcesSearch with animated search box (@cuong-tran)
- Add icon to jump directly to ExtensionDetailsScreen from SourcesScreen (@cuong-tran)
- Avoid showing ExtensionDetailsScreen for E-Hentai & ExHentai which is built-in & not actually installed extensions (@cuong-tran)
- Show NSFW mark on SourcesScreen list (@cuong-tran)
- update README & ISSUE_TEMPLTE (@cuong-tran)
- Upgrade AGP to 8.2.2 (@cuong-tran)
- build_preview: set version and always publish release (@cuong-tran)
- spotlight for splash screen in dark mode (@cuong-tran)
